Play Quills in Random Order
variable.tooltip: If checked, each secessive press of quill button with play random quill sound, unchecked will play in order

variable.label: For diesel sound set 4, the first horn is named

variable.tooltip: Rotate horn function will change this setting

variable.label: Bell type
Aux Input Loop Timer
variable.tooltip: Controls how long a loop sound is allowed to play when triggered by the aux input (reed switch input) a value of 42 gives about a 3 second loop time

variable.label: Smoke unit on time adjustment
variable.tooltip: adjusts the amount of time the fan is on for the smoke unit

variable.label: Smoke unit on time adjustment sign
variable.tooltip: Positive adds time, negative subtracts time

variable.label: Smoke unit off time adjustment
variable.tooltip: adjusts the amount of time the fan is off for the smoke unit

variable.label: Smoke unit off time adjustment sign
variable.tooltip: Positive adds time, negative subtracts time
